oai_dc:dc.dc:title: James Robertson Parkway Looking South Toward Church Street, c.1950s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of James Robertson Parkway near 8th Avenue North, looking south toward Church Street, circa 1950s. The area was part of the Capitol Hill Redevelopment Project. Launched in 1949 with demolition ceremonies in 1955, the Capitol Hill Redevelopment Project was to become the first urban renewal plan funded by Congress. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.);
